i.name: Power Chord
i.description: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.

q.name: Hymn of Valor
q.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.

w.name: Aria of Perseverance
w.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.

e.name: Song of Celerity
e.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.

r.name: Crescendo
r.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.

i1.blurb: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.
description: {{sbc|Aura:}} '''Sona's''' basic [[Champion ability|abilities]] each generate a unique [[aura]] for 3 seconds that empowers her and all allied [[champion]]s who enter its radius, also incurring a {{fd|0.5}} seconds period during which she cannot cast her other basic abilities.

{{sbc|Power Chord:}} After casting 3 basic abilities, '''Sona's''' next [[basic attack]] deals {{pp18|20|30|40|50|60|70|80|90|105|120|135|150|165|180|195|210|225|240|formula = 10 + 10 at each level up to 8 and + 15 up to 18}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}, with an additional effect depending on the last basic ability cast.
i1.name: Power Chord
notes: * When ''Power Chord'' is ready, Sona gains a ring around her.
** This ring will have a different color depending on the last ability used (''{{ai|Hymn of Valor|Sona|blue}}, {{ai|Aria of Perseverance|Sona|green}} or {{ai|Song of Celerity|Sona|purple}}'').
*** The effect does not change if abilities are used while the projectile is in motion.
* Sona's auras will only affect allied champions, not [[minion]]s or [[Champion summoned units|pets]].
* ''Power Chord'' affects [[turret]]s, [[inhibitor]]s, and the [[nexus]], but {{ai|Aria of Perseverance|Sona|Diminuendo's}} damage debuff does not.
* The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** ''Power Chord's'' bonus damage will go through {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodge}} while the triggering attack will be mitigated.
** ''Power Chord's'' damage can {{tip|blind|miss}} or be {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}.

riot.name: Power Chord
riot.description: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.

q1.blurb: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' sends out two bolts of sound that deal {{as|magic damage}} to the nearest enemies, prioritizing champions.
{{sbc|Aura:}} '''Sona''' and tagged allied champions deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} on their next basic attack within 3 seconds.
q1.name: Hymn of Valor
notes: * ''Hymn of Valor's'' aura doesn't trigger [[spell effects]].
* Even if both bolts hit the same enemy they can only be damaged by one.
* ''Hymn of Valor'' will only target enemy units if Sona has sight of them.
** If the target gets out of sight before the projectile hits them they will still be damaged.

riot.name: Hymn of Valor
riot.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.
riot.tooltip:
Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the nearest two enemies (prioritizes champions) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Staccato.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain an additional {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage on their next attack.

w1.blurb: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' {{tip|heals}} herself and the most wounded nearby allied champion.
{{sbc|Aura:}} '''Sona''' and tagged allied champions receive a {{tip|shield}} lasting up to {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord|Sona}} – Diminuendo:}} ''Power Chord'' reduces its target's damage output by 25% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} for 3 seconds.
w1.name: Aria of Perseverance
notes: * ''Aria of Perseverance'' can heal [[stealth]]ed ally champions without revealing them but the projectile will reveal their position on cast.
* If no one is injured ''Aria of Perseverance'' will target the closest allied champion.

* While ''Aria of Perseverance'' will not heal [[minion]]s or [[Champion summoned units|pets]] it will heal {{ai|Mirror Image|LeBlanc}}, {{ai|Children of the Grave|Mordekaiser}}, {{ai|Hallucinate|Shaco}}, and {{ai|Decoy|Wukong}}.
*Diminuendo will also reduce the target's size slightly as well.

riot.name: Aria of Perseverance
riot.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.
riot.tooltip:
Active: Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health to Sona and a nearby allied champion (prioritizes most wounded) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Diminuendo.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain a shield that prevents up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage within the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

e1.blurb: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 3 seconds, extended to up to 7 seconds if she doesn't take damage.
{{sbc|Aura:}} Tagged allied champions gain {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 3 seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord|Sona}} – Tempo:}} ''Power Chord'' {{tip|slow|slows}} its target by 40% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} for 2 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Self and Aura Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|10|11|12|13|14}}% {{as|(+ 6% per 100 AP)}}}}
e1.name: Song of Celerity

riot.name: Song of Celerity
riot.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.
riot.tooltip:
Active: Grants Sona {{ f1*100 }}% movement speed [{{ e1 }}% + {{ f2*100 }}% per 100 ability power] for {{ e9 }} seconds (or until damaged) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Tempo.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain {{ f3*100 }}% movement speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Sona's personal movement speed increase will always last at least {{ e5 }} seconds.

r1.blurb: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.2}}-second delay, '''Sona''' plays an irresistible chord in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemy champions struck and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
r1.name: Crescendo
notes: * Enemies {{tip|stun|stunned}} by ''Crescendo'' are made to dance 50% faster for its duration.
* ''Crescendo'' has a short travel time, and enemies will be stunned and take damage as soon as it reaches them, but if a target moves out of range as it is cast, the target will be unaffected.

riot.name: Crescendo
riot.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.
riot.tooltip:
Active: Strikes an irresistible chord, stunning enemy Champions and forcing them to dance for {{ e2 }} seconds and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Passive: Reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities by {{ e3 }}%.
